examples.example: 周末我和心爱的人有一场浪漫的约会。

translate.english: At the weekend, I have a romantic date with my beloved one.

examples.example: 我们约定下次约会时一起去看那部期待已久的电影。

translate.english: We agreed to go and watch that long-awaited movie together when we have the next date.

examples.example: 我们愉快地约定了下一次的约会，十分期待那一天的到来。

translate.english: We happily made an appointment for the next date and are really looking forward to the arrival of that day.
